name: Glueworld
description:
We made a physics puzzler for GMTK 2021!

Get the acorn to the squirrel by gluing together a construction!

Every asset in this game is original!
(We don't have any StackOverflow code in here either :) )

Note about gluing conditions:
That the sides have to be of the same length and also rotationally aligned.

Vurbank made the music for this project, here are some of his links (he wanted those to be added here):
https://soundcloud.com/vurbank
https://youtube.com/channel/UCiDraXsaqT1PsMZT5KEyLXw
